# systems.base.numerical_integration.stochastic.create_custom_or_random_brownian { #cdesym.systems.base.numerical_integration.stochastic.create_custom_or_random_brownian }

```python
systems.base.numerical_integration.stochastic.create_custom_or_random_brownian(
    key,
    t0,
    t1,
    shape,
    dW=None,
)
```

Create either custom or random Brownian motion for Diffrax.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                  | Description                                           | Default    |
|--------|-----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| key    | jax.random.PRNGKey    | Random key (used if dW is None)                       | _required_ |
| t0     | ScalarLike            | Start time                                            | _required_ |
| t1     | ScalarLike            | End time                                              | _required_ |
| shape  | tuple                 | Noise shape (nw,)                                     | _required_ |
| dW     | Optional\[ArrayLike\] | Custom Brownian increment. If None, generates random. | `None`     |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                               | Description   |
|--------|------------------------------------|---------------|
|        | Brownian motion object for Diffrax |               |

## Examples {.doc-section .doc-section-examples}

```python
>>> # Random noise
>>> key = jax.random.PRNGKey(42)
>>> brownian = create_custom_or_random_brownian(key, 0, 0.01, (1,))
>>>
>>> # Custom noise (deterministic)
>>> dW = jnp.array([0.5])
>>> brownian = create_custom_or_random_brownian(key, 0, 0.01, (1,), dW=dW)
```
